channel.title: NFL Films on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NFL Films on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Hard Knocks’ Boss on Josh Allen Wedding “Pipe Dream” and Barely Missing Out on Visit From the Killers
item.description: NFL Films producer Pat Harris tells The Hollywood Reporter about the team’s tough player cuts and why a shout-out to the Killers’ song “Mr. Brightside” caused a minor controversy for fans.

item.title: ‘Hard Knocks’ Boss on Josh Allen Wedding “Pipe Dream” and Barely Missing Out on Visit From the Killers
item.description: NFL Films producer Pat Harris tells The Hollywood Reporter about the team’s tough player cuts and why a shout-out to the Killers’ song “Mr. Brightside” caused a minor controversy for fans.

item.title: Roku Snags Documentary on Philadelphia Eagles Super Bowl Win (Exclusive)
item.description: ‘Super Bowl Champions: The 2024 Philadelphia Eagles,’ is from NFL Films and Dan Silver’s BD4 Productions, and chronicles the team’s journey.
